{"id":1294301645,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1718864881,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1294301645/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"15.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        map<char,int>mp;\n        int len=0;\n        int maxlen=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            if(mp.count(s[i])==0){\n                maxlen=max(maxlen,i-len+1);\n            }\n            else{\n                while(mp.count(s[i])!=0){\n                    mp[s[len]]--;\n                    if(mp[s[len]]==0){\n                        mp.erase(s[len]);\n                    }\n                    len++;\n                }\n            }\n            mp[s[i]]++;\n        }\n        return maxlen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
